per_frame_1=q1 = 0.0003*(pow(1+1.2*bass+0.4*bass_att+0.1*treb+0.1*treb_att+0.1*mid+0.1*mid_att,6));
per_frame_2=wave_r = wave_r + 1*sin(time*0.339);
per_frame_3=wave_g = wave_g + 1*sin(time*0.369);
per_frame_4=wave_b = wave_b + 1*sin(time*0.399);
per_frame_5=wave_x = wave_x + 0.3*sin(time);
per_frame_6=wave_y = wave_y + 0.3*cos(time);
per_frame_7=ib_r = ib_r + 1*sin(time*0.565);
per_frame_8=ib_g = ib_g + 1*sin(time*0.615);
per_frame_9=ib_b = ib_b + 1*sin(time*0.665);
per_frame_10=ob_r = ob_r + 1*cos(time*0.565);
per_frame_11=ob_g = ob_g + 1*cos(time*0.615);
per_frame_12=ob_b = ob_b + 1*cos(time*0.665);
per_frame_13=//ib_size = ib_size + 0.035*bass;
per_frame_14=warp = 0;
per_pixel_1=zoom = zoom - 0.025*sin(fps*6.6);
per_pixel_2=zoom = zoom - 0.035*sin(ang*11+(time));
per_pixel_3=rot = rot + 0.005*sin(fps*5.8);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`    float1 d = 0.01;
warp_5=`    float3 dx = ( 2*GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - 2*GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) )*1280*texsize.z*0.5;
warp_6=`    float3 dy = ( 2*GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - 2*GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) )*1024*texsize.w*0.5;
warp_7=`
warp_8=`    float2 my_uv = uv - (+float2(dx.y,dy.y)*0.3 + float2(dx.x,dy.x)*0.1 + float2(dy.y,-dx.y)*0.01)*0.01;
warp_9=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_fw_main, my_uv-floor(my_uv)).x;
warp_10=`    ret.x += (2*ret.x - 2*GetBlur1(my_uv).x)*.25 +0.0;
warp_11=`
warp_12=`
warp_13=`    my_uv = uv - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*0.01 + float2(dy.x,-dx.y)*0.001;
warp_14=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_fw_main, my_uv-floor(my_uv)).y;
warp_15=`    ret.y += (2*ret.y - 2*GetBlur3(my_uv).y)*.025 +0.01;
warp_16=`
warp_17=`}
comp_1=`float2 d;
comp_2=`float3 dx, dy;
comp_3=`
comp_4=`shader_body
comp_5=`{
comp_6=`   d = texsize.zw*1.5;
comp_7=`   dx = GetPixel(uv_orig + float2(1,0)*d) - GetPixel(uv_orig - float2(1,0)*d);
comp_8=`   dy = GetPixel(uv_orig + float2(0,1)*d) - GetPixel(uv_orig - float2(0,1)*d);
comp_9=`
comp_10=`
comp_11=`ret = GetPixel(uv).x*(1-length(float2(dx.y,dy.y)*8))*pow(hue_shader,6)*1.4;
comp_12=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(1,1,1),length(float2(dx.z,dy.z)*4));
comp_13=`
comp_14=`
comp_15=`}
